thread.title: Hitched Charlotte is giving away a FREE wedding in 2024 | wcnc.com
thread.title_full: Hitched Charlotte is giving away a FREE wedding in 2024 | wcnc.com

author: Charlotte Today
title: Hitched Charlotte is giving away a FREE wedding in 2024 | wcnc.com
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. — Local Life Magazine has partnered with several local businesses in the Charlotte area to celebrate life, love, community & the power of collaboration. They say they are so humbled to bless one deserving couple with a FREE wedding on September 15th, 2024 - the day they give back in a big way! Help Local Life Magazines spread the word to find this special couple!
For those planning to get married in 2024, here are some wedding planning tips!
1. Establish a budget. You can't do anything without a budget and figuring out where the money is coming from.
2. Pick a date. Pick a date before you pick a venue. You can pick a few dates and venue and cross reference. You can also choose a weeknight!
3. Create a Google Doc with all your vendor information so you can stay organized and easily share it with others.
For more information and to enter for your chance to win a free wedding, visit www.hitchedcharlotte.com .
Charlotte Today is a local lifestyle and entertainment show where you'll learn everything about the Queen City with hosts Mia Atkins and Eugene Robinson on WCNC Charlotte live weekdays at 11 a.m.
From what’s trending to local restaurants, events and entertainment, you’ll find it all on this show.
Charlotte Today also features sponsored content by local and national businesses. Are you a business interested in advertising with us ? Go to WCNC.com/advertise or call now (214) 977-6001
